item.title: Report E-2025020214
item.description:
Report E-2025020214

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-17T21:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-17
  • City: SIOUX CITY
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1421 ET, XPO-XSC notified ERTS of a cargo release. It was reported that approximately 1 cup of 105- conkit released from a plastic pail due to improper packaging (pail got squished due to the weight). The release impacted just the pail and pallet. Kim informed us that this was already cleaned up and placed into a 20-gallon drum.
